snippet: FIFA is considering action against the Brazilian football confederation spokesman over a confrontation with a Chile player on the sidelines of their teams' World Cup match on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: FIFA Weighing Action Against Brazil Team Spokesman
headline.main: FIFA Weighing Action Against Brazil Team Spokesman

lead_paragraph: FIFA is considering action against the Brazilian football confederation spokesman over a confrontation with a Chile player on the sidelines of their teams' World Cup match on Saturday.
